Class DetailsViewControllerMaster

java.lang.Object
com.rocketshipcheckingtool.ui.roles.masterController.DetailsViewControllerMaster
Direct Known Subclasses:
DetailsViewController, DetailsViewController
public abstract class DetailsViewControllerMaster extends Object
Abstract base controller class for managing the details view. Provides common functionality for handling shuttle data and user interactions.

      public DetailsViewControllerMaster()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the ComboBox listener. Logs the initialization process and handles shuttle selection changes.

    • loadShuttleContent

      protected void loadShuttleContent()
      Loads the shuttle content without a preselected shuttle. Calls the overloaded method with a null parameter.

    • getShuttleList

      protected abstract ArrayList<Shuttle> getShuttleList() throws IOException
      Abstract method to retrieve the list of shuttles. Must be implemented by subclasses to provide specific logic for fetching shuttles.
      Returns:
      A list of shuttles.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while retrieving the shuttle list.

    • loadShuttleContent

      protected void loadShuttleContent(String preSelectedShuttle)
      Loads the shuttle content with an optional preselected shuttle. Populates the ComboBox with shuttle names and sets the preselected shuttle if provided.
      Parameters:
      preSelectedShuttle - The name of the preselected shuttle, or null if none.

    • reload

      protected abstract void reload()
      Abstract method to reload the view. Must be implemented by subclasses to provide specific logic for reloading the view.

    • setViewManagerController

      public void setViewManagerController(ViewManagerController viewManagerController)
      Sets the ViewManagerController instance for managing the view.
      Parameters:
      viewManagerController - The ViewManagerController instance to set.

    • setClientRequests

      public void setClientRequests(ClientRequests clientRequests)
      Sets the ClientRequests instance for server communication. Loads the shuttle content and reloads the view.
      Parameters:
      clientRequests - The ClientRequests instance to set.
